## Beck Anxiety Inventory vs GHQ-30

Psychologists sometimes need to compare data gathered with different questionnaires such as the Beck Anxiety Inventory and GHQ-30, for example in a meta-analysis or longitudinal study using secondary data. Formerly, the process of harmonisation—identifying the similarities and differences in the items of these questionnaires—was a time-consuming and potentially subjective process. But now, psychologists have a smart new tool at their disposal: Harmony.

## Compare the items in Beck Anxiety Inventory and GHQ-30

Harmony is a software designed to simplify and expedite the process of questionnaire comparison. Harmony utilizes advanced natural language processing and generative AI models to automate the process of harmonising questionnaire items—like those found in the Beck Anxiety Inventory and GHQ-30.

## You may also be interested in these harmonisations

* [ESPAD vs DASI](/compare-harmonise-instruments/alcoholism/espad-vs-dasi)
* [PHQ-9 vs RCADS](/compare-harmonise-instruments/phq-9-vs-rcads)
* [ADOS vs BAPQ](/compare-harmonise-instruments/autism/ados-vs-bapq)



{{< card heading="Try Harmony" copy="Compare Beck Anxiety Inventory and GHQ-30 " url="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app" >}}

{{< youtube cEZppTBj1NI >}}


With Harmony, researchers can easily compare items within and across these questionnaires. Harmony even has the capability to compare items in multiple languages, thus broadening the scope of possible research studies. Using Harmony is as easy as selecting the instruments from Harmony's database or uploading your own instruments in PDF form. In the comparison of Beck Anxiety Inventory vs GHQ-30, Harmony will scan through each item in both instruments and provide a percentage match between them. This efficient tool enables researchers to conduct more accurate, reliable, and diverse studies by ensuring that the items in the Beck Anxiety Inventory and GHQ-30 are correctly matched. Therefore, if you are looking for an innovative and efficient solution to harmonise your psychological questionnaires, the Beck Anxiety Inventory vs GHQ-30 comparison will no longer be a tedious task with Harmony software.
